definitions.definition: Any transverse bar or piece , such as a bar across a door, or the iron bar or stock which passes through the shank of an anchor .
The top of the goal structure.
The top tube of a bicycle frame.

main_definition: Any transverse bar or piece , such as a bar across a door, or the iron bar or stock which passes through the shank of an anchor .
secondary_definitions: ( sports ) The top of the goal structure.
The top tube of a bicycle frame.
